name: Grilled trout
keywords: fennel, sage, trout, main course, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup olive oil, or 1/4 pound butter, melted

recipeInstructions.text: Tie the herbs to the body of the trout and secure with string. Brush with oil or butter.
Grill for five to seven minutes on each side. Be careful when turning the fish as it breaks easily. Fish is done when firm and white.
